name: Slash
description: A horizontal slashing attack with the weapon. Medium speed and damage.

windUp.description: Attacker prepares the slash, telegraphs become progressively visible

committed.description: Committed to the attack, weapon in motion, cannot be cancelled

impact.description: The blade connects with the target

recovery.description: Following through the slash, regaining balance and guard position

variablePower.description: Can use 50% less (1 stamina) for weaker/slower attack, or 50% more (3 stamina) for stronger/faster attack

telegraphs.description: Weight shifts to front foot, stance widens slightly
Shoulders rotate horizontally, opening striking angle
Full commitment, body aligned for horizontal slash, weapon at apex of arc

damage.notes: In prototype: 1 clean hit = death, contributes 1 to the 3-hit death counter
